course_description: An integrated approach to the synthesis, structure, and function of macromolecular biomolecules, including proteins, carbohydrates, DNA, and RNA. First half of a two-semester biochemistry sequence.
prerequisites: [(BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or (BIOL_OX 142)] and (CHEM 203 or CHEM 203Z or CHEM_OX 203 or CHEM 221 or CHEM_OX 221 or CHEM 221Z) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
